title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Clearly define the scope, objectives, and requirements for the PhilosophicalGodAI project, including a comprehensive list of philosophical questions to be addressed, the desired level of intelligence (Artificial General Intelligence), the expected capabilities (e.g., natural language processing, machine learning, knowledge representation), the ethical considerations (e.g., potential misuse, transparency, accountability), the impact assessment on society (both short-term and long-term), and the plan for addressing any potential risks or concerns.

title: Conduct Philosophical Research
description: Perform extensive research on various philosophical topics, theories, and debates to gather a comprehensive understanding of the questions to be addressed by the AI system.

title: Design AI Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture and components of the AI system, including the neural network architecture, knowledge representation, reasoning mechanisms, learning algorithms, ethical considerations, and outline a strategy for handling the vast amount of philosophical data while ensuring the AI's responses are coherent, thought-provoking, and safe.

title: Develop Knowledge Base
description: Create a comprehensive knowledge base to store and organize the philosophical information and data required for the AI system to reason and draw conclusions.

title: Implement AI Components
description: Implement the various components of the AI system, including the neural network, knowledge representation, reasoning engines, and learning algorithms, based on the designed architecture.
